name: Iron Meat (itch)
description:
Classic Run'n'gun game.
Challenge yourself in this oldstyle NES-themed game.
Just like in all classic games there will be three levels of difficulty.
Tons of guns, even more enemies (including of course WTF-bosses) and 10 levels of hard boiled fun is what you gonna get. 
Controls are simple and intuitive.Graphic is Nes-styled pixelart. 
Right now our game in early stage of development, but we will be improving. Also some sprites and at least half of sounds (excluding music) - are temporal.
Follow us on Twitter:  https://twitter.com/Ivan78607447
